item.title: Issue #869 created
item.description:
Incorrect example: for-each-pair

The fourth example of fn:for-each-pair is wrong:

for-each-pair(
  (1, 8, 2),
  (3, 4, 3),
  fn($item1, $item2, $pos) {
    $pos || ': ' || max(($item1, $item2))
  }
)

Result: ("1: 1", "2: 4", "3: 2")

The results as given return the min of the pair, not the max.
